text: 16|90|(nampikkaiyalarkale!) Ninkal niti celuttumpatiyakavum, nanmai ceyyumpatiyakavum, uravinarkalukku(p porul) kotuttu utavi ceyyumpatiyakavum niccayamaka allah (unkalai) evukiran. Manakketana kariyankal, pavam, aniyayam akiyavarriliruntu (unkalai) avan tatukkiran. Ninkal nallunarvu peruvatarkaka avan unkalukku (ippati) nallupatecam ceykiran
